import React from 'react' import { Button, Card, Col, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' function AddressDetails({address, updateModalShow, deleteModalShow}) { return ( <> {address.name}
{address.description.length > 50 ? `${address.description.substring(0, 50)}...` : address.description } {address.district} / {address.province.toUpperCase()} ) } export default AddressDetails
